name: ShowBuildRecordBuildScript

Record_Id.description: 记录ID,36位数字、小写字母、'-'组组合。
Record_Id.name: record_id

get.description: 获取构建记录的构建脚本

application/json.result:
---
version: "2.0"
timeout:
  limit: 240
  unit: "minute"
devcloud_metadata:
  label: "docker"
  imageRegex:
  - ".*/codeci/((?!dotnetframework|msbuild|dotnetcore|shell).)*$"
  buildType: "linux"
  jobName: "testJobName"
  jobId: "6d8522e0799b4d678d08ac22210b0aff"
  serviceType: "codeci"
  projectId: "b4d3971c3988463b865f6f920846149e"
stages:
  stage2:
    meta:
      uuid: "20040"
      displayName: "Code CheckOut"
    env:
      dockerImage: "swr.cn-north-7.myhuaweicloud.com/codeci/shell:shell4.2.46-git2.23-zip-1.1.0"
      dockerArgs: "-v /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime:ro -v /devcloud/cache/config_backup.json:/home/slave/.config/config_backup.json:ro\
        \ -e LC_ALL=en_US.utf8 -e LANGUAGE=en_US.utf8  --memory=6144M --cpus=2 "
      dockerImageBackup: "swr.cn-north-6.myhuaweicloud.com/codeci/shell:shell4.2.46-git2.23-zip-1.1.0"
      extraDockerImage: "swr.cn-north-7.myhuaweicloud.com/codeci/shell:shell4.2.46-git2.23-zip-1.1.0"
      extraDockerArgs: "-v /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime:ro -v /devcloud/cache/config_backup.json:/home/slave/.config/config_backup.json:ro\
        \ -e LC_ALL=en_US.utf8 -e LANGUAGE=en_US.utf8  --memory=6144M --cpus=2 "
      extraDockerImageBackup: "swr.cn-north-6.myhuaweicloud.com/codeci/shell:shell4.2.46-git2.23-zip-1.1.0"
      language: "zh-cn"
    tasks:
    - external_pre_checkout:
        openPlatFormUrl: "https://devcloud-backend.cn-north-7.myhuaweicloud.com:7632/wukong"
        openPlatformProxy: ""
        domainName: "testUser"
        codehubAdapterAddress: "https://devcloud-backend.cn-north-208.myhuaweicloud.com:7503"
        userName: "testUser"
        scm:
          url: "git@codehub.devcloud.cn-north-7.ulanqab.huawei.com:b4d3971c3988463b865f6f920846149e/aaa/Unit.git"
          branch: "master"
          branchRegex: ""
          branchRegexMessage: ""
          isAutoBuild: false
          repoID: "2111898074"
          repoExist: true
          disableSubmodules: true
          scmType: "codehub"
          buildType: "branch"
          checkoutName: "master"
          depth: "1"
          groupName: "b4d3971c3988463b865f6f920846149e/aaa"
          repoName: "Unit"
          webUrl: "https://devcloud.cn-north-7.ulanqab.huawei.com/codehub/2111898074/home"
        userId: "ae22fd035f354cfa8d82a3f1c8940446"
        domainId: "60021bab32fd450aa2cb89226f425e06"
        opensourceUrl: "https://opensource.cn-north-7.myhuaweicloud.com:8447"
    preCondition: "SUCCESS"
